message.content:
cs.CV, cs.MM, cs.IR, cs.LG, cs.MM

Reasoning: 
- cs.CV (Computer Vision) is the most likely category as the paper deals with video summarisation using visual features.
- cs.MM (Multimedia) is also likely as the paper deals with processing and summarising multimedia content.
- cs.IR (Information Retrieval) is relevant as the paper deals with reducing the amount of video data while preserving information content.
- cs.LG (Machine Learning) is relevant as the paper proposes a novel approach to video summarisation using a Bag-of-visual-Textures (BoT) approach.
- cs.MM (Multimedia) is again relevant as the paper deals with summarisation of both short-term and long-term videos.
